description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Very easy, yet so hard! PushCrates is a game that needs a good mental ability. Demonstrate your abilities to gain 50 levels, more and more complicated, funny and exciting. It is also very simple and suitable for all audiences.
